news.headline: Three Papers Accepted to NeurIPS 2024
news.description: We are excited to announce that three of our papers have been accepted to NeurIPS 2024! The papers cover neural reasoning, commonsense understanding, and multi-hop question answering.

news.headline: Welcome New Ph.D. Student
news.description: We are thrilled to welcome Alice Johnson to the lab! Alice will be working on natural language understanding and reasoning.

news.headline: Best Paper Award at ACL 2024
news.description: Our paper 'Commonsense Reasoning with Large Language Models' received the Best Paper Award at ACL 2024. Congratulations to Bob and the entire team!

news.headline: Lab Presents at NAACL 2024
news.description: David presented our work on improving dialogue systems with long-term memory at NAACL 2024 in Mexico City. Great job, David!

news.headline: New Collaboration with Industry Partner
news.description: We are excited to announce a new research collaboration focused on developing more robust natural language understanding systems for real-world applications.

news.headline: NSF Grant Awarded
news.description: Our lab has been awarded a 3-year NSF grant to support our research on neural reasoning and commonsense understanding. This funding will enable us to expand our team and research initiatives.

news.headline: Emma Wins Outstanding TA Award
news.description: Congratulations to Emma Wilson for receiving the Outstanding Teaching Assistant Award from the Computer Science Department!

news.headline: Workshop on Neural Reasoning Announced
news.description: We are organizing a workshop on Neural Reasoning and Commonsense Understanding at EMNLP 2024. Call for papers coming soon!
